trans-unit.source: With Azure Resource Manager, you define parameters for values you want to specify when the template is deployed.
trans-unit.target: With Azure Resource Manager, you define parameters for values you want to specify when the template is deployed.

trans-unit.source: The template includes a section called Parameters that contains all of the parameter values.
trans-unit.target: The template includes a section called Parameters that contains all of the parameter values.

trans-unit.source: You should define a parameter for those values that will vary based on the project you are deploying or based on the environment you are deploying to.
trans-unit.target: You should define a parameter for those values that will vary based on the project you are deploying or based on the environment you are deploying to.

trans-unit.source: Do not define parameters for values that will always stay the same.
trans-unit.target: Do not define parameters for values that will always stay the same.

trans-unit.source: Each parameter value is used in the template to define the resources that are deploy.
trans-unit.target: Each parameter value is used in the template to define the resources that are deploy.

trans-unit.source: When defining parameters, use the allowedValues field to specify which values a user can provide during deployment.
trans-unit.target: When defining parameters, use the allowedValues field to specify which values a user can provide during deployment.

trans-unit.source: Use the defaultValue field to assign a value to the parameter, if no value is provided during deployment.
trans-unit.target: Use the defaultValue field to assign a value to the parameter, if no value is provided during deployment.

trans-unit.source: We will describe each parameter in the template.
trans-unit.target: We will describe each parameter in the template.

trans-unit.source: The name of the logic app to create.
trans-unit.target: The name of the logic app to create.

trans-unit.source: The name of the App Service plan to create for hosting the logic app.
trans-unit.target: The name of the App Service plan to create for hosting the logic app.

trans-unit.source: The pricing tier for the logic app.
trans-unit.target: The pricing tier for the logic app.

trans-unit.source: The template defines the values that are permitted for this parameter (Free, Basic, Standard, or Premium), and assigns a default value (Standard) if no value is specified.
trans-unit.target: The template defines the values that are permitted for this parameter (Free, Basic, Standard, or Premium), and assigns a default value (Standard) if no value is specified.

trans-unit.source: The instance size of the app.
trans-unit.target: The instance size of the app.

trans-unit.source: The template defines the values that are permitted for this parameter (0, 1, or 2), and assigns a default value (0) if no value is specified.
trans-unit.target: The template defines the values that are permitted for this parameter (0, 1, or 2), and assigns a default value (0) if no value is specified.

trans-unit.source: The values correspond to small, medium and large.
trans-unit.target: The values correspond to small, medium and large.
